alert.note: Alert for Murray; Nobles; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 23 at 7:47PM CDT until October 23 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lyon County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Osceola County in northwestern Iowa... North central Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Eastern Rock County in southwestern Minnesota... Nobles County in southwestern Minnesota... Southern Murray County in southwestern Minnesota... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ellsworth, or near Rock Rapids, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained spotter reported 3 inch branch down near Doon, IA. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Adrian and Blue Mounds State Park around 755 PM CDT. Rushmore and Lismore around 800 PM CDT. Worthington, Leota and Wilmont around 805 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Chandler and Fulda. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
